HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Butcher small creatures recipe. Conserve freezer space with a <= 75 meat yielding creature recipe. Meat-counting butcher recipes. Different recipes to count various combinations of animal, human, and insect. • Separate cannibal and insect meals to avoid ingredient mixing. Supports non-vanilla insectoid and humanlike. Disallowed in starting food restrictions by default. To preserve balance these extra meal types have: * Disabled generation (e.g. resource pod drop, map prisoner cell spawn). * Disabled buying (trade stock generation). * Disabled scatter on map generation. • Default ingredient search radius. New bills will be created with this radius.
• Cannibal and insect meal separation now supports non-vanilla insectoid and humanlike.
• Butchers now include non-vanilla insectoid and humanlike in their counts. • Butcher small creature recipe is now calculated and will work with content mods.

Shift+scroll cycle area restrictions. Shift + scroll wheel on area restrictions will cycle them for all listed pawns (colonist or animal). Works with colonist and animal-specific areas from Alex TD's Enhancement Pack. Also recommended: VouLT's Better Pawn Control for policies.
Patch Better Pawn Control for newborns. Hatched and birthed animals will inherit the entire restriction policy of their parent.
Pause on "beginning their assault". When a staged attack actually commences, not just appears.
• Fixed recipes, meals, and mod compatibility when language isn't set to English.

Settlement restock indicator. Restock countdown for each settlement on world map (appears after trade). Patch Quality Builder to preserve forbidden. Patches a bug where quality designations overwrite forbidden on game load.

Global and per map default ingredient search radius. A new default can be set from any bill, or from mod settings. • 1.1 compatibility update. • Bulk recipe variants, available from settings. • Vanilla Furniture Expanded compatibility (among others). Recipes are now detectable by other mods and thus work with: * Stone Campfire * Electric Butcher * Large Stove
• Moved and improved Haul before supply. This feature is now in Jobs of Opportunity (While You're Up).

• Fixed cannibal and insect meals when created by a different mod. • Fixed bulk cannibal/insect recipes. • All features tested and working on 1.2. • New settings (off by default) to hide human and insect ingredient from all non-cannibal, non-insect recipes.
